archetype_name: Family Low-Sodium American & French Comfort (30–60, Mild)
name: Herb-Roasted Chicken Thighs with Lemon Quinoa and Spring Vegetables
description: Family-friendly roasted chicken with bright lemon quinoa and a tray of rosemary carrots and green beans. Built for low-sodium cooking with fresh herbs, citrus, and pepper for flavor.
prep_steps: Rinse 1.5 cups quinoa under cold water in a fine strainer.
Trim ends from green beans; peel and slice carrots into sticks.
Zest the lemon, then cut it in half and squeeze out the juice; keep zest and juice separate.
Pat chicken thighs dry with paper towels and sprinkle with black pepper.
cook_steps: Roast vegetables: On a sheet pan, toss green beans and carrots with 1 tbsp olive oil, half the minced garlic, black pepper, and rosemary. Spread in a single layer and roast 20–25 minutes, turning once.

Sear chicken: Heat 1 tbsp olive oil in an oven-safe skillet over medium-high. Place chicken thighs skin-side down; sear 5–6 minutes until browned. Flip, add remaining garlic and a few lemon slices to the pan, sprinkle with thyme, and transfer skillet to the oven. Roast 15–18 minutes until chicken reaches 165°F (74°C). Rest 5 minutes.

Cook quinoa: In a medium saucepan, combine rinsed quinoa, 3 cups water, lemon zest, and a pinch of black pepper. Bring to a boil, reduce to low, cover, and simmer 15 minutes. Remove from heat, keep covered 5 minutes, then fluff with a fork.
Finish quinoa: Stir in 1 tbsp olive oil, half the lemon juice, and most of the chopped parsley. Adjust pepper and more lemon juice to taste.
Serve: Plate lemon quinoa, top with chicken, and spoon any pan juices over. Add roasted green beans and carrots on the side. Sprinkle remaining parsley.

Sear chicken: Heat 1 tbsp olive oil in an oven-safe skillet over medium-high. Place chicken thighs skin-side down; sear 5–6 minutes until browned. Flip, add remaining garlic and a few lemon slices to the pan, sprinkle with thyme, and transfer skillet to the oven. Roast 15–18 minutes until chicken reaches 165°F (74°C). Rest 5 minutes.

Cook quinoa: In a medium saucepan, combine rinsed quinoa, 3 cups water, lemon zest, and a pinch of black pepper. Bring to a boil, reduce to low, cover, and simmer 15 minutes. Remove from heat, keep covered 5 minutes, then fluff with a fork.
Finish quinoa: Stir in 1 tbsp olive oil, half the lemon juice, and most of the chopped parsley. Adjust pepper and more lemon juice to taste.
Serve: Plate lemon quinoa, top with chicken, and spoon any pan juices over. Add roasted green beans and carrots on the side. Sprinkle remaining parsley.

ingredients.preparation: zested and juiced; a few thin slices reserved

final_ingredients.preparation: zested and juiced; a few thin slices reserved
